The '''Amethyst Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]].

This series can be [[Forging|forged]] and all weapons in the series require {{Item|Amethyst Lump|30}}, which can only be found in [[Inazuma]].

Only [[Kitain Cross Spear]] and [[Katsuragikiri Nagamasa]] share the same ability bonus.
